languages.text: "Я знаете чего боюсь? Что они сейчас вернутся, а эти сволочи бунтарские их на подлете и собьют. Я хотел найти местечко повыше, развернуть там вокс-передатчик и начать трансляцию: "Полеты, мол, закрыты, садиться нельзя". Да не успел — гады эти слепые за мной увязались, пока удирал — оступился, передатчик сломал". {n}Солдат, повесив нос, скорбно глядит под ноги.{/n} "Волнуюсь я за нее. Пилот она первоклассный, а я все одно волнуюсь".

"You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."
languages.original_text: "Я знаете чего боюсь? Что они сейчас вернутся, а эти сволочи бунтарские их на подлете и собьют. Я хотел найти местечко повыше, развернуть там вокс-передатчик и начать трансляцию: "Полеты, мол, закрыты, садиться нельзя". Да не успел — гады эти слепые за мной увязались, пока удирал — оступился, передатчик сломал". {n}Солдат, повесив нос, скорбно глядит под ноги.{/n} "Волнуюсь я за нее. Пилот она первоклассный, а я все одно волнуюсь".

traits.locale_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and message them, 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — these blind no-goods chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

But I didn't make it in time — these blind no-goods chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

"You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, wovor ich Angst habe? Dass sie zurückkommen und diese verfluchten Rebellen sie vom Himmel schießen. Ich wollte mir eine erhöhte Stelle suchen, dort einen Vox-Transmitter aufstellen und ihnen eine Nachricht schicken: 'Der Himmel ist blockiert, versucht nicht zu landen.' Aber ich habe es nicht rechtzeitig geschafft. Diese blinden Hunde haben mich verfolgt, und ich bin beim Rennen gestolpert und der Transmitter ist kaputtgegangen." {n}Er lässt betrübt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich mache mir Sorgen um sie. Sie ist eine hervorragende Pilotin, aber ich mache mir trotzdem Sorgen."
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, wovor ich Angst habe? Dass sie zurückkommen und diese verfluchten Rebellen sie vom Himmel schießen. Ich wollte mir eine erhöhte Stelle suchen, dort einen Vox-Transmitter aufstellen und ihnen eine Nachricht schicken: 'Der Himmel ist blockiert, versucht nicht zu landen.' Aber ich habe es nicht rechtzeitig geschafft. Diese blinden Hunde haben mich verfolgt, und ich bin beim Rennen gestolpert und der Transmitter ist kaputtgegangen." {n}Er lässt betrübt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich mache mir Sorgen um sie. Sie ist eine hervorragende Pilotin, aber ich mache mir trotzdem Sorgen."

languages.text: « Vous savez ce que je crains le plus ? C'est qu'ils reviennent et que ces ordures de rebelles les abattent. Je voulais trouver un endroit élevé où installer un émetteur vox et leur envoyer un message précisant que l'espace aérien était fermé et qu'il ne fallait pas tenter d'atterrir... mais j'ai été découvert, ces fumiers m'ont pourchassé et, au cours de ma fuite, j'ai cassé l'émetteur en trébuchant, {n}dit-il en inclinant la tête d'un air triste.{/n} Je m'en fais pour elle. J'ai beau savoir que c'est une excellente pilote, je suis tout de même inquiet. »
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez ce que je crains le plus ? C'est qu'ils reviennent et que ces ordures de rebelles les abattent. Je voulais trouver un endroit élevé où installer un émetteur-vox et leur envoyer un message précisant que l'espace aérien était fermé et qu'il ne fallait pas tenter d'atterrir... mais j'ai été découvert, ces fumiers m'ont pourchassé et, au cours de ma fuite, j'ai cassé l'émetteur en trébuchant, {n}dit-il en inclinant la tête d'un air triste.{/n} Je m'en fais pour elle. J'ai beau savoir que c'est une excellente pilote, je suis tout de même inquiet. »

languages.text: “您知道我害怕什么吗？我怕他们回来，怕那群叛徒人渣把他们从天上打下来。我想找个高地，在那里设置音阵广播，给他们发送信号，告诉他们‘天空已被封锁，千万不能降落’。但我却失败了，那群瞎眼的混蛋追得我满地跑。我在跑的时候绊了一跤，把音阵装置摔坏了。”{n}他悲伤地低下了头。{/n}“我很担心她。虽然她是位优秀的飞行员，但我还是很担心。”
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

traits.locale_text: “您知道我害怕什么吗？我怕他们回来，怕那群叛徒人渣把他们从天上打下来。我想找个高地，在那里设置音阵广播，给他们发送信号，告诉他们‘天空已被封锁，千万不能降落’。但我却失败了，那群瞎眼的混蛋追得我满地跑。我在跑的时候绊了一跤，把音阵装置摔坏了。”{n}他悲伤地低下了头。{/n}“我很担心她。虽然她是位优秀的飞行员，但我还是很担心。”

languages.text: 「僕が恐れてるのは、エヴァイン卿たちが戻ってきて、あの卑怯な暴徒どもに撃たれて空中に投げ出されるんじゃないかってことです。高い場所を見つけて音声通信送受信装置を設置し、エヴァイン卿たちにメッセージを送りたかったんです。『当空域は封鎖されていて、着陸は禁止されている』って。ですが、間に合いませんでした…こんな目が潰れた犬たちに追いかけられて、走ってるうちに転んでキャスターを壊しちゃったんです」{n}青年は悲しげにうなだれている。{/n}「ラケルが心配です。彼女は優秀な操縦士ですが、それでも心配なんです」
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

traits.locale_text: 「僕が恐れてるのは、エヴァイン卿たちが戻ってきて、あの卑怯な暴徒どもに撃たれて空中に投げ出されるんじゃないかってことです。高い場所を見つけてヴォクスキャストを設置し、エヴァイン卿たちにメッセージを送りたかったんです。『当空域は閉鎖中である、着陸は禁止されている』って。ですが、間に合いませんでした…こんな目が潰れた犬たちに追いかけられて、走ってるうちに転んでキャスターを壊しちゃったんです」{n}青年は悲しげにうなだれている。{/n}「ラケルが心配です。彼女は優秀な操縦士ですが、それでも心配なんです」

languages.text: «¿Sabe de qué tengo miedo? De que vuelvan, y esos rebeldes de mierda les dispararán y les derribarán. Quería encontrar un lugar alto, instalar allí un voco amplificador y enviarles una transmisión: "El cielo está cerrado, no intenten aterrizar". Pero no llegué a tiempo. Esos perros me persiguieron y, mientras corría, tropecé y rompí el amplificador». {n}Baja la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «Me preocupo por ella. Es una piloto excelente, pero eso no evita que me preocupe».
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe de qué tengo miedo? De que vuelvan, y esos rebeldes de mierda les dispararán y les derribarán. Quería encontrar un lugar alto, instalar allí un voco amplificador y enviarles una transmisión: "El cielo está cerrado, no intenten aterrizar". Pero no llegué a tiempo. Esos perros me persiguieron y, mientras corría, tropecé y rompí el amplificador». {n}Baja la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «Me preocupo por ella. Es una piloto excelente, pero eso no evita que me preocupe».

languages.text: "Asıl neyden korkuyorum biliyor musunuz? Geri gelirken şerefsiz isyancıların mekiklerini vurup indirmesinden. Yüksek bir yer bulup bir voksyayar kurarak bir mesaj göndermeyi planlıyordum. 'Gökyüzü kapalı, inmeye çalışmayın.' diyecektim ama vaktinde yetişemedim. O kör köpekler peşime takıldı, koşarken ayağım takıldı ve voksyayarı kırdım." {n}Başını üzüntüyle sallandırıyor.{/n} "Aklım nişanlımda. Mükemmel bir pilot olsa da endişeleniyorum işte."
languages.original_text: "You know what I'm afraid of? That they'll come back, and those rebel scumbags will shoot them out of the sky. I wanted to find a place that's high up, set up a vox-caster there, and send them a transmission: 'The sky is closed off, don't try to land.' But I didn't make it in time — those blind dogs chased after me, and as I was running, I tripped and broke the caster." {n}He hangs his head sadly.{/n} "I worry for her. She's an excellent pilot, but I still worry."

O kör köpekler peşime takıldı, koşarken ayağım takıldı ve voksyayarı kırdım." {n}Başını üzüntüyle sallandırıyor.{/n} "Aklım nişanlımda. Mükemmel bir pilot olsa da endişeleniyorum işte."
